section.title: Exercise - Add test dependencies
section.para: Popular test frameworks, like JUnit, Hamcrest, Mockito and others can be obtained from different updatesites.
Eclipse Orbit for example provides a Test category which contains these test frameworks mentioned earlier.
In case a target definition file does not exist yet, it needs to be created. For standard RCP applications the following dependies are necessary.
The Orbit Repositories can be found here: Orbit Downloads .
